apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices portrays a loving couple, a man with a medium-light skin tone and another man with a light skin tone, embraced by a red heart. The design features Appleâ€™s signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting, giving the figures and the heart a soft, inviting glow.  The smooth, rounded forms and gentle expressions, combined with the prominent heart, powerfully symbolize romantic love, strong relationships, and deep affection between two men.
